MNTHSUSA.title: MNTHSUSA
MNTHSUSA.description: Months: End Page - INUSA If YEARSUSA.Response.Coded = {NA} and MNTHSUSA.Response.Coded = {NA} Then YEARSUSA.Errors.AddNew("err","Please enter either YEARS or MONTHS") Goto LABEL_INUSA End If If YEARSUSA > 0 and MNTHSUSA > 0 Then YEARSUSA.Errors.AddNew("err","Please enter one, either YEARS or MONTHS") Goto LABEL_INUSA End If End If
